column5: So I was just out picking up some things for stocking stuffers and this happens…  As I walk to my car from the store a woman walks up to me holding out a box and says to me “have you heard about the Slap Chop promotion we are running today?”.  I of course laugh out loud and say “no, but you’re gonna love my nuts!” as I hold up a bag from the bulk barn.  She wasn’t impressed but I sure was…  HAHA

LOL.. my "funny" yesterday was being in Sears... and a women at the check out yells to the whole store. "I'M DONE MY CHRISTMAS SHOPPING..YAHOO". And then the cashier says.. "I'm sorry Mam.. but your Mastercard has been declined, do you have another card" !  Gave me a chuckle at the time, but sad all the same. Christmas has got out of hand.. and you can't spend what you don't have folks!
ouch, that gets a big "D'OH!" on her part...
